author: cms-sw
body:
Reverts cms-sw/cmssw#41198
Just in case the investigations on issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/41246 suggest to build a new release without this PR.
At the moment this revert PR is only intended to verify that it is still mergeable in 13_0_X, and it can run.
title: Revert "[13_0_X] Update muon shower data formats for 2023 running"
